Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the split key method of a SplitKey object.
        """
kwargs = {'split_key_method': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The split key method must be a SplitKeyMethod enumeration.', secrets.
    SplitKey, **kwargs)
args = secrets.SplitKey(), 'split_key_method', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The split key method must be a SplitKeyMethod enumeration.', setattr,
    *args)
